mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(AUTHOR_GROUP_SN) + 1,1) AS AUTHOR_GROUP_SN FROM TCM_AUTHOR_GROUP WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TCM_AUTHOR_GROUP ( AUTHOR_GROUP_SN, AUTHOR_GROUP_NM, USE_AT, FRST_REGISTER_SN, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_UPDUSR_SN, LAST_UPDT_DT ) VALUES ( #{groupSn}, #{groupNm}, #{useAt}, #{emplyrSn}, SYSDATE, #{emplyrSn}, SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO TCM_EMPLYRBY_GROUP_AUTHOR ( EMPLYR_SN, AUTHOR_GROUP_SN, FRST_REGISTER_SN, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_UPDUSR_SN, LAST_UPDT_DT ) VALUES ( #{emplyrSn}, #{groupSn}, #{emplyrSn}, SYSDATE, #{emplyrSn}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT PERSONAL.AUTHOR_GROUP_SN GROUP_SN, --그룹일련번호 GRP.AUTHOR_GROUP_NM GROUP_NM --그룹명 FROM TCM_EMPLYRBY_GROUP_AUTHOR PERSONAL, TCM_AUTHOR_GROUP GRP WHERE PERSONAL.AUTHOR_GROUP_SN = GRP.AUTHOR_GROUP_SN AND GRP.USE_AT = 'Y' AND PERSONAL.EMPLYR_SN = #{emplyrSn} ORDER BY PERSONAL.AUTHOR_GROUP_SN
SELECT DECODE(COUNT(EMPLYR_SN), 1, 'Y', 'N') leadAt FROM TCM_EMPLYRBY_GROUP_AUTHOR WHERE FRST_REGISTER_SN = #{emplyrSn} AND AUTHOR_GROUP_SN = #{groupSn}
mapper.update: UPDATE TCM_AUTHOR_GROUP SET USE_AT = 'N', LAST_UPDUSR_SN #{emplyrSn}, LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE AUTHOR_GROUP_SN = #{groupSn}
mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_SN FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM-1 NUM, PERSONAL.AUTHOR_GROUP_SN GROUP_SN, --그룹일련번호 GRP.AUTHOR_GROUP_NM GROUP_NM --그룹명 FROM TCM_EMPLYRBY_GROUP_AUTHOR PERSONAL, TCM_AUTHOR_GROUP GRP WHERE PERSONAL.AUTHOR_GROUP_SN = GRP.AUTHOR_GROUP_SN AND GRP.USE_AT = 'Y' AND PERSONAL.EMPLYR_SN = #{emplyrSn} ORDER BY PERSONAL.AUTHOR_GROUP_SN ) WHERE NUM = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE SET USE_AT = 'N' FROM TCM_AUTHOR_GROUP WHERE AUTHOR_GROUP_SN = #{groupSn}
